message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price!
Thank you for the offer, I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I would like to stick to my previous proposal. I am offering $95 for the product.
